Manx: O Hiarn Yee Ayr ooilley niarthal cur dooin yn spyrryd dy creenagh as thoiggal jeh Chreest.
English: O Lord God Almighty give us the spirit of wisdom and understanding of Christ.
Diplomatic: O Hiarn Yee Ayr ooilley niarthal cur dooin yn spyrryd dy creenagh as thoiggal jeh Chreest

Manx: Lhig da sooillyn yn tushtey ain ve er ny ostley nagh bee mayd ny sodjey er shaghryn voish bea Yee liorish yn veehushtey t’ayns nyn greeaghyn dorraghey.
English: Let the eyes of our knowledge be opened so that we will not be any longer astray from a life of God by the ignorance that is in our dark hearts.
Diplomatic: lhig da sooilyn yn tushtey ain ve er ny ostley nagh be mayd ny sodjey er shaghryn voish bea Yee Liorish yn veehushtey ta ayns nyn ghreeghyn dorraghey.

Manx: O, lhig dooin ooilley ve er ny ynsaghey liort hene, as çheet dy ve creeney gys saualtys trooid credjue ta ayns Chreest;  Yeesey nagh lhig dooin dy bragh çhyndaa veih’n aney casherick t’er ny livrey hooin
English: O, Let us all be taught by you yourself, and become wise to salvation through a belief in Christ Jesus that will not let us ever turn from the holy commandment that is delivered to us.
Diplomatic: O lhig dooin ooilley ve er ny insaghey liort hene, as cheet dy ve creeney gys saualtys Trooid credjue ta ayns Chreest Yeesey nagh lhig dooin dy bragh chindaa veih yn anney casherick ter ny livrey hooin

Manx: Saue shin ta shin gwee ort veih ghoaill rish dy ve chreesteeyn fegoish credjue cooie ayns Chreest.
English: Save us, we beseech thee, from admiting to being Christians without proper belief in Christ.
Diplomatic: Saue shin ta shin gwee ort veih ghoaill rish dy ve chreesteeyn fegoish credjue cooie ayns Chreest.

Manx: Cur dooin yn Spyrryd Noo dy ynsaghey shin dy ve arrysagh as dy hreigeil nyn beccaghyn, as jean shin aarloo son yn Caanan flaunysagh trooid yn fer ta eddyr ain nyn ver kionnee deyr Yeesey Chreest
English: Give us the Holy Spirit to teach us to be sorry and to forsake our sins, and make us ready for the heavenly Caanan through the one who is between us, our dear redeemer; Jesus Christ.
Diplomatic: Chur dooin yn spyrryd Noo dy insaghey shin dy ve arrysagh as dy cregait nyn beccaghyn, as jean shin aarloo son yn Caanan flaunysagh trooid yn fer ta eddyr ain nyn ver kionnee deyr Yeesey Chreest
